Title: Dead City
Actors: Irene Papas, Nikos Tzogias, Eleni Zafeiriou, Giannis Argyris
Plot: Petros finishes his studies and returns to his home, in Mystras. His mother expects him to continue an old vendetta of his ancestors, but he has not such intentions. On the contrary, he will fall in love with Lena, member of the hostile family.
